name: El Septimo - Sacred Arts Collection - Van Gogh
additionalNotes: That is exactly what El Septimo Cigars did in the summer of 2021 when it announced its Sacred Arts Collection, a group of seven cigars that represents the biblical story of the seven days of creation and is dedicated to a famous painter and one of his famous works. El Septimo Sacred Arts Collection Leonardo da Vinci, El Septimo Sacred Arts Collection Michelangelo, El Septimo Sacred Arts Collection Michelangelo, El Septimo Sacred Arts Collection Raphael, El Septimo Sacred Arts Collection Salvador Dali, El Septimo Sacred Arts Collection Rembrandt, El Septimo Sacred Arts Collection Van Gogh. Each of the seven cigars comes has a unique blend, size and price, and while each cigar is offered in 20-count boxes that features the art work that inspired it, each gets its own color.
